[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.md) &gt; [IClusterClient](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.iclusterclient.md)

## IClusterClient interface

Represents an OpenSearch cluster API client created by the platform. It allows to call API on behalf of the internal OpenSearchDashboards user and the actual user that is derived from the request headers (via `asScoped(...)`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IClusterClient 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [asInternalUser](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.iclusterclient.asinternaluser.md) | <code>OpenSearchClient</code> | A [client](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.opensearchclient.md) to be used to query the OPENSEARCH cluster on behalf of the OpenSearchDashboards internal user |
|  [asScoped](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.iclusterclient.asscoped.md) | <code>(request: ScopeableRequest) =&gt; IScopedClusterClient</code> | Creates a [scoped cluster client](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.iscopedclusterclient.md) bound to given [request](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.scopeablerequest.md) |
